beer.beer_description:
• LUPPOLO DOMINANTE •
Cascade coltivato in Italia
• PROFILO •
Una pregiata lager, dal corpo rotondo e generosamente luppolata, caratterizzata dall’uso di una varietà di luppolo coltivato in Italia.
• ABBINAMENTI •
Ideale con primi piatti dal gusto rotondo e formaggi di media stagionatura o in accompagnamento a piatti a base di cereali, verdure e pesci bianchi.

-----

4 Luppoli Originale (Original beer with 4 hops varieties) is a low fermentation lager with a particularly harmonious flavour.
 
Fruity aromatic notes sweeten its moderately bitter taste.

Hops: Cascade, Columbus, Herkules, Zeus.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 13!

beer.beer_description:
5 luppoli Bock Chiara (Bock Blond beer with 5 hop varieties) is a malted beer with a rounded flavour and a fruity aroma balanced by a definite but delicate bitter taste.

The 5-hops recipe is perfect with white meats, mature cheese and cold cuts.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 85 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 18!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 35 different beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 8.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 60 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 350 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 90 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 19!

beer.beer_description:
3 Luppoli (beer with 3 hop varieties) is a light lager with a well-balanced, refreshing flavour making it ideal for everyday meals.
 
It is a perfect match with all the tastes of the Mediterranean tradition.

Our beer is based on the traditional Italian recipe, which delivers a full-flavoured lager with an assertive hoppy bitterness, a flavour profile iconic to the Italian "aperitivo" culture where bitter drinks are used to ignite the appetite and begin a dining experience.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 490 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 99! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 100 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 21!

You've just tried one of three available styles from Style Hunt - Ale Trail!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 400 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 81. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description:
• LUPPOLO DOMINANTE •
Cascade coltivato in Italia
• PROFILO •
Una pregiata lager, dal corpo rotondo e generosamente luppolata, caratterizzata dall’uso di una varietà di luppolo coltivato in Italia.
• ABBINAMENTI •
Ideale con primi piatti dal gusto rotondo e formaggi di media stagionatura o in accompagnamento a piatti a base di cereali, verdure e pesci bianchi.

-----

4 Luppoli Originale (Original beer with 4 hops varieties) is a low fermentation lager with a particularly harmonious flavour.
 
Fruity aromatic notes sweeten its moderately bitter taste.

Hops: Cascade, Columbus, Herkules, Zeus.

3 Luppoli (beer with 3 hop varieties) is a light lager with a well-balanced, refreshing flavour making it ideal for everyday meals.
 
It is a perfect match with all the tastes of the Mediterranean tradition.

6 Luppoli Bock Rossa (Bock Red beer with 6 hop varieties) is a malted malt with a rounded flavour marked by an aroma of toasted cereals and notes of caramel and licorice.
It is ideal with red meats, tasty cheese, game and chocolate.

5 luppoli Bock Chiara (Bock Blond beer with 5 hop varieties) is a malted beer with a rounded flavour and a fruity aroma balanced by a definite but delicate bitter taste.

The 5-hops recipe is perfect with white meats, mature cheese and cold cuts.

Una Ricetta Stagionale, creata dai Mastri Birrai del Birrificio Angelo Poretti, profumata ai fiori di sambuco e caratterizzata da una fragrante luppolatura. Una birra non filtrata dalla lieve opalescenza, dolcemente profumata e ricca di aromi floreali.

A soft and wrapping beer, thanks to the delicate hopping seduce even those who in life needs a hint of sweetness.
To be enjoyed with the one you love.

Predominant hop: Sorachi Ace, a hop from Japan and unique aroma, reminiscent of lemon and lemongrass.

Il colore delicatamente ambrato e la cremosità della schiuma rendono questa birra Pale Ale irresistibile fin dal primo sguardo.
 
L’aroma velatamente speziato e i sentori floreali conferiti dal luppolo si completano vicendevolmente dando vita ad una brillante commistione di profumi.
 
Complessa nella struttura, dal corpo pieno e deciso, risulta al contempo morbida ed equilibrata, da assaporare sorso dopo sorso.
Una birra beverina dal sapore fresco e dissetante, in cui gli aromi dei luppoli e le fragranze del malto si integrano alla gentile ruvidità del lievito. Luppolo dominante: Cscade.

Our beer is based on the traditional Italian recipe, which delivers a full-flavoured lager with an assertive hoppy bitterness, a flavour profile iconic to the Italian "aperitivo" culture where bitter drinks are used to ignite the appetite and begin a dining experience.

Una Ricetta Stagionale al miele di castagno, creata dai Mastri Birrai del Birrificio Angelo Poretti, caratterizzata da un gusto moderatamente dolce e una fragrante luppolatura. Una birra non filtrata, dal colore ambrato e da morbide note aromatiche e speziate.
Carattere deciso,fine luppolatura bassa fermentazione

With Birrificio Angelo Poretti 10 Luppoli we live a universal experience: its hops, selected by master brewers in the continents of the world, give this beer the magic of eclectic and exciting aromas.

We toast with Champagne Beer when the Italian excellence meets the cultures and traditions of the Italian Pavilion at Expo Milano 2015.

Its fine and elegant perlage accompanies perfectly seafood and shellfish, pâté or special aperitifs.

Our brewmaster of Birrificio Angelo Poretti celebrate conviviality creating a new recipe for those who love to spend time together and share good food, ideas and experiences.

Thus was born 8 Luppoli, La Saison. The fruity and spicy notes, conferred by the skillful use of hops and yeast, give to this pale ale a varied and attractive bouquet of aromas.

The abundant foam reveals a lager extremely balanced and intriguing. Snug and tantalizing to the palate, 8 Luppoli La Saison is the perfect beer to accompany soft cheeses of medium seasoning and fish dishes.

Saison Agrumata,birra chiara ad alta fermentazione,corpo morbido,vellutata da spiccate note agrumate bouchet aromatico,fresca e profumata.
(da etichetta)
Brewed in collaboration with the italian chef Davide Oldani.
